adHeader: Reliable moving service from a fully licensed and insured company (18
adDetails: We provide excellent moving services, including residence, business, office and piano. Last minute services are available. Our movers are very nice, importantly experienced, efficient and hard-working. We have professionally equipped new moving trucks We provide dollies and handtrucks We bring free furniture blankets, wrapping tapes and shrink wraps. We have boxes and wardrobe boxes for temporary use on the moving day. We also disassemble and reassemble your furniture. Our Rates are: $65 for 2 movers, and $85 for 3 movers (minimum 2 hours) Time starts at your door and ends upon everything unloaded to your new location. Contact us for more information or get a free quote: 40 8-2 27-66 86 Huge Discounts for Long-Distance Moving services Moving Services to Sacramento, Stockton, Fresno, Medesto, Santa Barbra, Los Angeles, San Diego, Las Vegas, Oregon and Seattle. Flexible Schedules and Flat Rate.
